verses.text: In the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* came this \w word|strong="H1697"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \w Stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* in the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto them; \w diminish|strong="H1639"\w* not a \w word|strong="H1697"\w*:

If so be they will \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, that I may \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* me of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, which I \w purpose|strong="H2803"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of their \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.

And thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; If ye will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to me, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, which I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you,

To \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, whom I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto you, both rising up \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* \add them\add*, but ye have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w*;

Then will I \w make|strong="H5414"\w* this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* like \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w* to all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

So the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Now it came to pass, when \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \add him\add* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Why hast thou \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be like \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H2717"\w* without an \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w*? And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* against \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ When the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, then they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and sat \w down|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add house\add*.  +  r 26.10  t in the…: or, at the door *

Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* unto the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* \w worthy|strong="H4941"\w* to \w die|strong="H4194"\w*; for he hath \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, as ye have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* with your \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.\f + \fr 26.11 \ft This man…: Heb. The judgment of death is for this man\f*

¶ Then \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* against this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* that ye have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*.

Therefore now \w amend|strong="H3190"\w* your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, and \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* him of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that he hath \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against you.

As for me, behold, I \add am\add* in your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with me as \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w meet|strong="H3477"\w* unto you.\f + \fr 26.14 \ft as…: Heb. as it is good and right in your eyes\f*

But \w know|strong="H3045"\w* ye for \w certain|strong="H3045"\w*, that if ye put me to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, ye shall surely \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon yourselves, and upon this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and upon the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof: for of a \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me unto you to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* all these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in your \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and to the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*; This \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* not \w worthy|strong="H4941"\w* to \w die|strong="H4194"\w*: for he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to us in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Then rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w certain|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Micah|strong="H4320"\w* the \w Morasthite|strong="H4183"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* shall be \w plowed|strong="H2790"\w* \add like\add* a \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* shall become \w heaps|strong="H5856"\w*, and the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* as the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of a \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

Did \w Hezekiah|strong="H2396"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* put him at \w all|strong="H4191"\w* to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*? did he not \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w besought|strong="H2470"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* him of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* which he had \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* against them? \w Thus|strong="H0587"\w* might we \w procure|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against our \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*.  +  r 26.19  t the \+nd LORD\+nd*, and the: Heb. the face of the \+nd LORD\+nd*, etc *

And there was also a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* in the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* of \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, who \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* and against this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* according to all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*:

And when \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, with all his mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to put him to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: but when \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* it, he was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*;

And \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \add namely\add*, \w Elnathan|strong="H0494"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Achbor|strong="H5907"\w*, and \add certain\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* with him into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And they fetched \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w Urijah|strong="H0223"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him unto \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; who \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* him with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* his dead \w body|strong="H5038"\w* into the \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w common|strong="H1121"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 26.23 \ft common…: Heb. sons of the people\f*

Nevertheless the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* was with \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, that they should not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to put him to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.
